# [Interview #1152: Calamity-Seattle, Entry #81](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1152#81)

#### Question

Is there such a thing as a ranged Shardblade?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Ranged Shardblade? There are those who are better at throwing theirs.
